Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Linda Creglow
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids and to hook up to the tv to stream from the internet. I wish I had bought this for myself a few months before.Great features:Still has a DVD burner! Some companies are getting away from them to make smaller, lighter, computers. Like the one my company purchased for me. This one works great!Has all the inputs and outputs! It has VGA port to output to a projector! Those are going away now, being replaced with display ports, to make you buy a new adaptor. This one has it!Basically, this computer has all the standard items you want that new computers are trying to get away from. Plus the new power and operating system.That is the hardware. The software, Windows 8 takes some getting use to. But blame Microsoft for that, not Dell. I don't know what Microsoft was thinking. Just click on the desktop button, and all will be fine. I still don't know why they had to get away from the clock at the bottom right corner, unless you are in the desktop, but whatever.

Reviews.Title: O
Reviews.Author: Isabel Freitas Barros
Reviews.Content: I did not like this seler because was not a new computer and I didn't know that. It was showing that it was new

Reviews.Title: trust a dell
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this laptop even windows 8. It is so much easier to use then my old one. I will never buy anything but a dell.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-4010U Processor (3M Cache, up to 1.7 GHz)
6 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15R i15RM-1465sLV 15.6-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
